description: “Those are shorts, I promise,” ABC’s Will Reeve said after getting busted for only being partially dressed on camera.
title: Reporter Caught Wearing Suit With No Pants Live On ‘Good Morning America’
title_page: Reporter Caught Wearing Suit With No Pants Live On ‘Good Morning America’ | HuffPost
maintext:
Work attire for Zoom conferences during self-isolation is a lot like that saying about mullets — except it’s business up top and a pajama party down below.
Yet, most of us would like to think that if we were to appear on live TV during the coronavirus pandemic, we’d probably make the effort to put on an actual pair of pants.
Unfortunately, that wasn’t the case for Will Reeve, an ABC reporter (and the son of actor Christopher Reeve), who appeared on “Good Morning America” Tuesday morning wearing a blazer, a button-down shirt and what appears to be ... his underwear.
Hey put some pants on my guy pic.twitter.com/PpCIBRrjP5 — Adam Graham (@grahamorama) April 28, 2020
As you can see in the “GMA” video above, Reeve was reporting on a story about how drones are delivering pharmaceutical prescriptions to a vulnerable retirement community in Florida. In the beginning of the segment, Reeve’s lower half is covered by a graphic on the lower part of the screen, so he appears to be fully dressed.
Yet, at the end of the segment, Reeve seems to get a bit more comfortable and a part of his thigh becomes visible. At one point, he even moves his leg, which makes his lack of pants pretty obvious.
Screenshot via “Good Morning America” A hint of thigh.
When the screen shifts to a two-shot of Reeve with the “GMA” anchors, it becomes abundantly clear that he only bothered to dress the top half of his body.
Screenshot via “Good Morning America” Full thigh in bloom.
Viewers on Twitter immediately began posting screenshots of the potentially relatable moment.
Is it too much to expect reporters to wear pants?@GMA pic.twitter.com/064cNDsmID — K Prudhomme O'Brien (@prudhommeobrien) April 28, 2020
And it seems that Reeve had a pretty fun time responding to them — claiming in one that he was wearing extremely short shorts and not just underwear.
😂🤦🏻‍♂️those are shorts I promise — Will Reeve (@ReeveWill) April 28, 2020
Man the more I look at this the more thigh I see. Yikes. — Will Reeve (@ReeveWill) April 28, 2020
I have ARRIVED*
*in the most hilariously mortifying way possible https://t.co/2NQ85QEJVr — Will Reeve (@ReeveWill) April 28, 2020
We’re our own camera operators these days when we broadcast from home 😬 — Will Reeve (@ReeveWill) April 28, 2020
When WFH goes wrong (or, your self-framed live shot goes too wide).
Hope everyone got a much needed laugh 😂 pic.twitter.com/GbyLBhL7Be — Will Reeve (@ReeveWill) April 28, 2020
